title: The Fog

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the night, choose whether you want to darken the night or day. You may do each of these three times.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune
- Darkening the day does the following:
> - The first time you use it, players will no longer be able to whisper. 
> - The second time you use it, players will not be revealed as dead until they are hanged or visited (by a player other than the attacker). They will still be mechanically dead. Hanging them does not end the day.
> - The third time you use it, all voting becomes hidden. Players will no longer be able to see who voted for who, or how many votes each person has.
- Darkening the night does the following:
> - The first time you use it, players no longer receive external notifications such as roleblocks or attacks. They will still receive notifications from their own role.
> - The second time you use it, every player has a 20% chance to visit a random neighbor of their target. 
> - The third time you use it, you may kill someone each night in addition to your normal ability. Their death will appear as "They were lost in the fog."

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all major factions. You may win with Neutrals.

desc:
